instruction: Describe the management strategies of the given organization.
output: The Red Cross management strategies focus on sustainability and humanitarian assistance. They aim to strengthen capacity and build resilience by providing relief and giving people the tools to become self-reliant and improve their well-being. The organization also strives to create value in partnership with other humanitarian organizations and other sources of funding. In addition, the Red Cross works to build trust with stakeholders by providing reliable assistance and accounting for the effectiveness of their programs.
